name: Weight of Wisdom
description:
You are a wizard Barry!

Embark in a journey to find the ancient tome "From Peasant to King in 5 simple steps". 

  • Aim your mouse at the ghouls to shoot your fireballs at them .
  • Drink green potions to become stronger 
  • Drink red potions to shoot faster (click the potion's icon to activate)

But watch out! If you drink both potions at once before you digest you are going to get fat and slow. Such is the "Weight of Wisdom" or maybe is just gluttony, who knows.
